WITH RECURSIVE descendants (id) AS ( SELECT id FROM categories WHERE id = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT c.id FROM categories c, descendants d WHERE c.parent_id = d.id ) SELECT * FROM categories WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM descendants) ORDER BY parent_id ASC, sibling_index ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO categories (name, parent_id, sibling_index, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{parentId}, #{siblingIndex}, #{description})
